imdb.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
imdb.plot: A semi-spinoff of the popular Yu-Gi-Oh anime series, focusing on a boy named Jaden and his misadventures as a student at an esteemed Duel Monsters academy.

episodes.title: A Creeping Threat! The Mysterious Visitor
episodes.plot: Having ended his conflict with Yubel, Jaden returns to Duel Academy in order to complete his third and final year there. Duel Disks cease to function properly, and a new enemy appears.

episodes.title: Farewell, Duel Academia! The Path Judai Chooses
episodes.plot: Jaden contemplates leaving Duel Academy, as his friends investigate who burned the room of "defective" cards. Jaden again Duels the black-clad man, who calls himself Trueman. Elsewhere, Atticus appears to be having nightmares, and Yusuke Fujiwara continues his mysterious activity.

episodes.title: The Truth Behind Darkness! Judai VS Fubuki
episodes.plot: Atticus endeavors to recover his lost memories of what happened in the Abandoned Dorm, and Duels Jaden at that location with Nightshroud's "Red-Eyes Darkness Dragon" in the hopes of it acting as a trigger for his memories. Yusuke Fujiwara continues his mysterious activities.

episodes.title: Fusing Souls! Neos VS F-G-D
episodes.plot: Yusuke Fujiwara is revealed to be the Duel Spirit of Honest, who was previously the real Fujiwara's Spirit Partner. He vows to avenge his master, but is ultimately talked down by Jaden. Trueman attacks again and Jaden uses Honest's powers to aid in his Duel against him.

episodes.title: Shall We Duel? Invitation to a Pair Duel
episodes.plot: The junior students at Duel Academy organize a Tag Dueling tournament, where the senior students Duel against the junior students.

episodes.title: Judai VS Asuka! Face-Down Card of Hidden Emotions
episodes.plot: The Tag Dueling tournament reaches its final match: Jaden and Alexis against Hassleberry and Blair. Jaden and Alexis still are not working well together, and Blair activates a card allowing them to switch partners. Alexis struggles with her decision on what to do when after graduating and with her feelings for Jaden, which the latter seems oblivious to.

episodes.title: Challenge from Psycho Shocker
episodes.plot: Zane washes up on the beach around Duel Academy, somehow still alive. A Jinzo Art Duelist named Makoto Inotsume defeats Chancellor Sheppard and wishes to Duel Zane to destroy the Cyber Art once and for all. Zane is still recovering from his heart problems, but Duels Inotsume anyway.

episodes.title: The Inherited Cyber Dark Dragon
episodes.plot: Syrus takes up his brother's Deck to save the Cyber Art from the Jinzo Art Duelist Makoto Inotsume. While training, he cannot get the Deck to function properly for him, but discovers something about Zane's heart condition in the process.

episodes.title: Aim for it Manjoume! Path to a Pro Duelist!
episodes.plot: Chazz aims to become a Pro League Duelist, but cannot acquire a sponsor. Dr. Crowler arranges for him to become the assistant of Aster in an effort to help him become a better Duelist and learn the basics of the Pro League.

episodes.title: Armed Dragon VS Dragoon D End
episodes.plot: Chazz Duels Aster in a faux Duel organized by Mike, the duplicitous television producer. Chazz enlists Jaden's help to even the odds, as if he wishes to defeat Aster, then he wants to do it on his own, not due to Mike's interference.

episodes.title: Gratitude Duel! Chronos vs. The Original Dropout Boy
episodes.plot: With graduation approaching, Dr. Crowler begins to revert to his old ways, and Jaden Duels him to find out why.

episodes.title: Opening of Graduation Duel! Neos vs Black Flame Dragon of Horus
episodes.plot: Duel Academy's Graduation Duels begins, and Jaden Duels a second-year student named Daigo Sorano. Meanwhile, Trueman's attack begins in Domino City, where he begins absorbing residents into the World of Darkness.

episodes.title: Price of Decision! O'Brien Flame of Darkness
episodes.plot: Axel finds himself Dueling Trueman, who uses psychological warfare and hallucinations to create darkness in Axel's heart, while taking the appearance of Axel's own father.

episodes.title: Saiou, Again! Activate 'Decisive Power of Absolute Destiny'
episodes.plot: Jaden is saved from Trueman by Sartorius, but the latter is only part of the plot, being forced to Duel Jaden in order to save his sister, Sarina.

episodes.title: End of Destiny! Magma Neos VS Dark Ruler
episodes.plot: Jaden's Duel with Sartorius continues, with the latter intent on saving his sister, Sarina

episodes.title: Duel Academia Crisis! The Gem Beasts Blocking the Way
episodes.plot: Jaden is hallucinating, but begins to make his way back to Duel Academy. On the island, Trueman has taken the appearance and Deck of Daigo Sorano and is using them to defeat various students, continuing his siege, and absorbing people into the World of Darkness.

episodes.title: Invasion of Darkness! The Stolen Memories
episodes.plot: Trueman's siege continues, and the entire school, save for Atticus is absorbed into the World of Darkness. In an attempt to free them, Atticus confronts Nightshroud.

episodes.title: Activate, Clear World! Ferocious Negative Effect
episodes.plot: Atticus continues his Duel with Nightshroud as the latter reveals he has possessed Yusuke Fujiwara.

episodes.title: Battle Royale! Judai VS Johan VS Fujiwara
episodes.plot: Nightshroud begins a Battle Royal with Jaden and Jesse, attempting to turn Jesse against Jaden. Jaden vows to save Yusuke Fujiwara from Nightshroud on behalf of Honest.

episodes.title: Rainbow Neos, Protector of Bonds VS Clear Vicious Knight
episodes.plot: Jaden and Jesse continue their Duel against Nightshroud to save Yusuke Fujiwara. Nightshroud uses Trap Cards to manipulate the attacks and attributes of his opponent's monsters, while Jaden and Jesse narrowly avoid defeat after defeat.

episodes.title: Combo of Terror! Zero and Infinity
episodes.plot: Jaden appears to be the last remaining human on Earth, with only Pharaoh and the spirit of Professor Banner for company. Nightshroud reveals his true form, as well as the origins of the universe. Jaden and Nightshroud begin their final confrontation.

episodes.title: Final Hope! Yuki Judai
episodes.plot: Jaden continues his confrontation with Nightshroud as the latter finds a way to counter Jaden's "Neos Wiseman". Those trapped in the World of Darkness begin to gain their memories and emotions back as Jaden attempts to find a way to prevail.

episodes.title: Good-Bye Judai! Tearful Graduation Ceremony
episodes.plot: Jaden attends his graduation ceremony and ends up traveling back in time, where he Duels Yugi Muto when he was at his strongest - just after winning the Battle City tournament and acquiring the Egyptian God cards.

episodes.title: The True Graduation Duel! Judai VS Legendary Duelist
episodes.plot: Jaden returns to Domino City and faces The King Of Games himself, Yugi Muto (or is it Yami Yugi in Yugi's flesh?).

episodes.title: Third Time's a Charm
episodes.plot: Jaden reflects on last year's adventures as he prepares for the third year at Duel Academy.

episodes.title: Jewel of a Duel: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jaden meets North Academy's top student Jesse Anderson, a duelist who can speak to monster spirits -just like Jaden can.

episodes.title: Jewel of a Duel: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden's duel against Jesse continues as we learn the origins of Jesse's mysterious Crystal Beast cards.

episodes.title: Hanging with Axel: Part 1
episodes.plot: Syria is kidnapped by Duel Academy's new bad boy Axel Brodie, and only Jaden can save him... by dueling Axel.

episodes.title: Hanging with Axel: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden's duel against Axel continues as Syrus's life hangs by a thread... literally.

episodes.title: Primal Instinct
episodes.plot: Strange electromagnetic waves ignite Hassleberry's animal instincts as he battles Jim Cook and his pet crocodile Shirley.

episodes.title: Head in the Clouds: Part 1
episodes.plot: Furious that he's no longer the richest kid in school, Chazz challenges billionaire Adrian Gecko to a duel in the sky!

episodes.title: Head in the Clouds: Part 2
episodes.plot: With his powerful deck of cloud monsters, Adrian Gecko takes Chazz by storm!

episodes.title: Win Mr. Stein's Duel: Part 1
episodes.plot: While searching for Viper, Jaden encounters a former teacher who has one final test for him!

episodes.title: Win Mr. Stein's Duel: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden and Professor Stein's duel continues as Jaden tries to stay awake to learn one last lesson.

episodes.title: Trapper Keeper: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jesse and Jaden are on the hunt for Viper... until Jesse's Crystal Beasts become the hunted!

episodes.title: Trapper Keeper: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jesse's duel against Trapper continues as Jesse fights to free his Crystal Beasts from Trapper's traps!

episodes.title: A Snake in the Grass: Part 1
episodes.plot: Professor Viper raises the stakes by forcing Jaden to duel on a tower where the only way down is a 20-story drop!

episodes.title: A Snake in the Grass: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden continues his duel with Viper, but in a swamp full of serpents and snakes, will he be able to find victory?

episodes.title: A Snake in the Grass: Part 3
episodes.plot: It's now or never as Jaden tries to defeat Viper and his snakes before they swallow up Jaden's life points for good.

episodes.title: Inter-Dimension Detention
episodes.plot: Jaden and his friends find themselves in a different dimension where duel monsters are real, the ocean is a sea of sand and... Wait, class is still in session?

episodes.title: Sub-Desert Duel
episodes.plot: After one of their classmates becomes ill, the gang ventures off to find a deserted submarine in the desert. Can they find what they're looking for, or is someone out to sink their plans before they get there?

episodes.title: The Night of the Living Duelists
episodes.plot: As an army of Duel Ghouls slowly takes over Duel Academy, can Jaden and his friends figure out a way to duel these ghouls, or will they all get schooled in the process?

episodes.title: School Ghoul Duels
episodes.plot: It's an all-out battle with the Duel Ghouls as Jaden tries to get Blair the medicine she needs. Will she get the first aid in time, or have the Duel Ghouls prescribed a different kind of treatment for her?

episodes.title: Triple Play: Part 1
episodes.plot: When three rogue students go looking for food, they end up biting off more than they can chew. And when Jaden gets challenged, it soon becomes a battle with triple the action, triple the duels and triple the danger!

episodes.title: Triple Play: Part 2
episodes.plot: With Jesse, Jim and Axel facing off against three masked duelists, there's no telling what might happen. It's an all-out battle where the winners get their just desserts and the losers just get hungry!

episodes.title: Return of the Sacred Beasts
episodes.plot: Jaden finally confronts the student formally known as Marcel. But before Jaden can find out who's who, a roaring rumble begins to unravel!

episodes.title: Breaking of the Sacred Seal
episodes.plot: As Jaden tries to stop the Three Sacred Beasts from being released, a battle for the beasts begins as Adrian Gecko decides to go for the cards himself!

episodes.title: A Dimensional Duel
episodes.plot: It's a duel between two dimensions as Zane and Jesse square off in a back-and-forth battle to get back home.

episodes.title: Unleash the Dragon: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jaiden face off against the leader of the monsters putting his life and his friend's life in danger.

episodes.title: Unleash the Dragon: Part 2
episodes.plot: The duel between Jaiden and the leader of the monsters continues.

episodes.title: All For One
episodes.plot: Most of the students have returned from the alternate universe only to find that a few of their friends were left behind. Full of guilt, Jaden concocts a dangerous plan to get them back.

episodes.title: A New World Order
episodes.plot: Having agreed to go find Jesse, Jaden and the gang find themselves journeying through a strange dark world where getting your game on involves risking more than just your life points!

episodes.title: Friend or Fiend
episodes.plot: The search for Jesse continues as Jaden battles a fiend named Scarr. Can Jaden defeat this member of the Dark Army, or will this duel send him to the stars?

episodes.title: Dueling with the Dark Army
episodes.plot: After hearing that Jesse may be imprisoned in a camp nearby, Jaden decides to risk everything to try and free his friend.

episodes.title: Turning the Page: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jaiden duel against another leader putting again his life and his friends life in dangerous. For every single attack he do, one of his friends go to the stars.

episodes.title: Turning the Page: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaiden continue the fight against the new leader alone when his friends are sent to the stars and axel, jimmy and Syrus left him.

episodes.title: The State of Syrus
episodes.plot: After witnessing his closest friends being sent to the stars, Syrus finds himself questioning the actions of his best friend Jaden. Is it game over for this friendship, or will Syrus be willing to deal his friend a new hand?

episodes.title: The Darkness Revealed
episodes.plot: Axel and Jim set off to confront the Supreme King, and after challenging him to a duel, they soon discover that this mysterious ruler is an all-too-familiar... friend?!

episodes.title: A Sight Unseen: Part 1
episodes.plot: After discovering that the Supreme King and Jaden are one and the same, Jim looks to stare down the darkness controlling his friend and defeat it with a gift given to him long ago!

episodes.title: A Sight Unseen: Part 2
episodes.plot: With the help of the Eye of Orichalcum, Jim takes aim at the evil gripping Jaden!

episodes.title: What Lies Beneath: Part 1
episodes.plot: After witnessing the dark powers of the Supreme King, Axel finds himself afraid for the first time in his life. Can Axel face his fears, or will the guilt of running scared force him to give up dueling for good?

episodes.title: What Lies Beneath: Part 2
episodes.plot: Looking to conquer his fears and face them head-on, Axel teams up with Aster and Zane in a last ditch effort to save their friend Jaden!

episodes.title: What Lies Beneath: Part 3
episodes.plot: With the Supreme King strengthening his grip over Jaden, Axel unleashes an all-out assault in the hopes of finally freeing his friend from the depths of darkness!

episodes.title: The Forbidden Ritual: Part 1
episodes.plot: In his quest for ultimate power, Adrian Gecko finds himself having to ask a dear friend to pay the ultimate price!

episodes.title: The Forbidden Ritual: Part 2
episodes.plot: With the last of Echo's duel energy at stake, Aster Phoenix looks to change her fate with his deck of Destiny Heroes.

episodes.title: Conquering the Past: Part 1
episodes.plot: Hoping to teach his friend a valuable lesson, Zane challenges Jaden to a duel of heart-pounding proportions.

episodes.title: Conquering the Past: Part 2
episodes.plot: Under the guise of Jesse, Yubel faces off against Zane in a confrontation that ends up having heart-stopping consequences!

episodes.title: Conquering the Past: Part 3
episodes.plot: As the battle draws to a close, Zane looks to make one last push to free Jesse from Yubel's mind-controlling clutches before his heart forces him to throw in the towel!

episodes.title: The Ultimate Face-Off: Part 1
episodes.plot: With the power of Exodia by his side, Adrian Gecko takes on Yubel in a duel to rule!

episodes.title: The Ultimate Face-Off: Part 2
episodes.plot: The clash between Adrian and Yubel continues as Adrian attempts to unleash the Ultimate Forbidden One!

episodes.title: The Power Within: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jaden duels Jesse in an attempt to break Yubel's hold over him.

episodes.title: The Power Within: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden, with the help of his Elemental Heroes, tries to free Jesse's spirit from Yubel's control.

episodes.title: Return of the Supreme King: Part 1
episodes.plot: With Jesse safe and sound, Jaden agrees to settle the score once and for all with Yubel!

episodes.title: Return of the Supreme King: Part 2
episodes.plot: With the help of Jesse's deck and the power of the Supreme King, Jaden looks to deal a final blow to Yubel and free his friends from their dimensional detentions!

episodes.title: Return of the Supreme King: Part 3
episodes.plot: In order to free his friends, Jaden must first figure out a way to destroy Yubel's ultimate incarnation! Can Jaden stop the unstoppable, or will this nightmare of a beast put any and all dreams of a rescue to rest?!

episodes.title: Judai Revived!? A Brand New Journey
episodes.plot: Jaden's friends are returned to Duel Academy, though Jaden himself does not. They reminisce about the events of the past three years and their memories of Jaden.

episodes.title: Back to Duel
episodes.plot: Year two at Duel Academy kicks off with a bang as an unknown freshman challenges Jaden to a duel!

episodes.title: Champion or Chazz-Been?
episodes.plot: When Syrus stumbles into the girls' dorm, he puts himself and Jaden in danger of being expelled, forcing Jaden to win a duel to win their freedom.

episodes.title: A Hassleberry Hounding
episodes.plot: Jaden throws down with a school bully to win back the duel disks he stole.

episodes.title: Sad But Truesdale
episodes.plot: Syrus squares off against Missy, the insect duelist, for a chance to advance to Ra Yellow!

episodes.title: The Demon
episodes.plot: Zane, now a professional duelist, goes up against top-ranking pro Aster Phoenix, as reports of a mysterious 'demon' cause a local scare.

episodes.title: A New Breed of Hero: Part 1
episodes.plot: Aster accuses Jaden publicly of copying his game, though not citing him, and proves himself as the better by challenging him into a duel - once again, but this time with a surprising deck.

episodes.title: A New Breed of Hero: Part 2
episodes.plot: The duel reaches an unexpected point where Aster takes over, relating to his forlorn past, and vindictively defeats Jaden who yields to despair.

episodes.title: Pop Goes the Duel
episodes.plot: To drum-up publicity, Crowler tries to turn Alexis and her brother Atticus into a pop-star dueling duo!

episodes.title: I've Seen the Light
episodes.plot: The always sinister and ever-creepy Sartorius arrives on Academy Island and sets his sights on Chazz Princeton.

episodes.title: A Greater Porpoise
episodes.plot: Unable to duel, Jaden sets off in search of answers and ends up in a strange world inhabited by...talking dolphin-men!?

episodes.title: Curry Worries
episodes.plot: A bizarre chef duels against Hassleberry for a taste of his Pot Roast Surprise!

episodes.title: Camaraderie Contest
episodes.plot: After fighting for weeks over who is Jaden's true best friend, Syrus and Hassleberry decide to settle it with a duel!

episodes.title: No Pain, No Game
episodes.plot: After hitting rock bottom, Zane encounters the sinister Mr. Shroud who convinces him to join a dangerous underground dueling league!

episodes.title: Going Bananas
episodes.plot: After roaming Academy Island for days without eating, Jaden begins to hallucinate about his past duels.

episodes.title: Homecoming Duel: Part 1
episodes.plot: In his triumphant return to Duel Academy, Jaden faces Aster Phoenix in a battle to save his dorm.

episodes.title: Homecoming Duel: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden has a lot to learn about his new deck as Aster's Destiny Heroes continue to devastate him!

episodes.title: Dormitory Demolition
episodes.plot: The heads of the school go head-to-head as Crowler faces Bonaparte to protect the Slifer Red dorm from destruction!

episodes.title: Obelisk White?
episodes.plot: Chazz, now under the influence of the evil Master Sartorius, tries to convince Alexis to join the Society of Light.

episodes.title: DuelFellas
episodes.plot: Jaden faces three-time video game champ Lorenzo to protect his dorm. But is Lorenzo working for the evil Master Sartorius!?

episodes.title: Not Playing with a Full Deck
episodes.plot: Jaden faces a sleazy attorney, known as X, who's strategy is to destroy his opponent's deck!

episodes.title: Source of Strength
episodes.plot: In his ongoing search for powerful duelists, Sartorius sets his sights on Hassleberry. But little does Sartorius know that this dino duelist has a startling secret!

episodes.title: Happily Never After
episodes.plot: Jaden faces Princess Rose and her Frog Princes in a fairytale frenzy! Will it be a happy ending for Jaden?

episodes.title: Taken by Storm: Part 1
episodes.plot: Sartorius sends his team of duelists to take down Jaden's best friends.

episodes.title: Taken by Storm: Part 2
episodes.plot: Syrus and Hassleberry are in for nasty weather; Frost and Thunder continue their fierce attack.

episodes.title: J-Dawg and T-Bone
episodes.plot: The last surviving member of the Light Brigade takes on Jaden. But who's really behind this duel?

episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jaden and Aster battle Sarina and her dueling partner.

episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror: Part 2
episodes.plot: The duel continues between Aster; Jaden and Sarina.

episodes.title: What a Doll!
episodes.plot: Jaden is challenged to a duel by a mysterious young girl with a shocking secret!

episodes.title: Let's Make a Duel
episodes.plot: Game show fanatic Bob Banter challenges Jaden to a duel in order to impress Alexis.

episodes.title: Magnetic Personality
episodes.plot: Desperate for attention, Bastion breaks into the White Dorm and demands they admit him as a member.

episodes.title: Schooling the Master
episodes.plot: Zane climbs to the 'top of the world' to face his former master...Chancellor Sheppard!

episodes.title: Generation neXt
episodes.plot: When Jaden arrives late to his entrance exam for Duel Academy, he has to go above and beyond expectations to prove that he deserves to make the cut!

episodes.title: Rah, Rah Ra!
episodes.plot: Someone has stolen the Winged Dragon of Ra and is using it to cause mayhem and destruction at Duel Academy!

episodes.title: The Art of the Duel
episodes.plot: Pro duelist and Broadway star Orlando faces Jaden in a duel that's a real showstopper!

episodes.title: Blinded by the Light: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jaden fights Chazz in an effort to break Sartorius's hold over him.

episodes.title: Blinded by the Light: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden, with the aid of the OJAMAS, tries to knock some sense to Chazz.

episodes.title: The Darkness Within
episodes.plot: Atticus's alter ego Night Shroud returns to face Zane in a Shadow Game!

episodes.title: Pro-Dueling
episodes.plot: In an attempt to save their careers, Crowler and Bonaparte enlist the help of two old friends, Damon and the Little Belowski!

episodes.title: Don't Fear the Reaper
episodes.plot: A duelist from North Academy is using the power of the Grim Reaper to win duels in one move!

episodes.title: Duel for Hire
episodes.plot: A duelist from North Academy is using the power of the Grim Reaper to win duels in one move!

episodes.title: Heart of Ice: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jaden battles Alexis in an attempt to win back her friendship.

episodes.title: Heart of Ice: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden continues his fight to wake Alexis up from her brainwashed state.

episodes.title: Tough Love
episodes.plot: Syrus finally faces his big brother Zane in a duel that's more painful than he ever imagined!

episodes.title: It's All Relative
episodes.plot: World renowned dueling physicist Eisenstein faces Jaden to prove that science is more powerful than luck.

episodes.title: The Dark Light
episodes.plot: Duelist League World Champion, The D, defends his title for the first time in 10 years against criminal mastermind, The Collector.

episodes.title: Ultimate Destiny
episodes.plot: Aster faces-off against The D and discovers that his stepfather's been hiding some inner-demons!

episodes.title: The Key Factor
episodes.plot: Prince Ojin challenges Jaden to a duel in which the winner receives the key to a destructive satellite!

episodes.title: The Phoenix Has Landed: Part 1
episodes.plot: Aster and his former manager, Sartorius, have a confrontation about the events that happened around the same time as his father's disappearance.

episodes.title: The Phoenix Has Landed: Part 2
episodes.plot: The battle between Aster and Sartorius rages on and the planet's destiny is in jeopardy.

episodes.title: The Hands of Justice: Part 1
episodes.plot: An evil alien has possessed Sartorius, and Jaden must defeat him in order to save the people of Earth from becoming mindless zombies!

episodes.title: The Hands of Justice: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden is shown a disturbing vision of the planet's fate should he lose against the Light of Destruction

episodes.title: Future Changes
episodes.plot: The future looks bleak as the Light of Destruction continues to overwhelm Jaden while a brainwashing satellite pointing towards Earth is activated!

episodes.title: Welcome to Duel Academy
episodes.plot: Jaden Yuki arrives late for the duel academy entrance exams. The principal insists he be given a chance, the Vice Princpal reluctantly agrees. He doesn't want Jaden there, and uses his own personal deck for the exam, to get rid of the late comer

episodes.title: Fureimu winguman
episodes.plot: Jaden and Syrus explore the duel academy. They end up at the Obelisx dueling auditorium. Chaz challenges Jaden to a duel.

episodes.title: Etowâru saibâ
episodes.plot: Crowler fakes a note from Alexis and puts it on Jaden's shoes. Syrus finds the note, Jaden placed his shoes in Syrus's locker, Syrus goes to meet Alexis. Jaden goes after Syrus. When they find Alexis, she says could report them for being out after hours, but says if Jaden beats her in a duel, she won't report them.

episodes.title: 5-juu gattai! VWXYZ
episodes.plot: The Academy receives a shipment of rare cards. Crowler gives Chazz the rarest/most powerful cards from the shipment and arranges for Chazz and Jaden to duel during the exams. How can Jaden win against Chazz's stacked deck?

episodes.title: Yami no dêmon dekki
episodes.plot: Jaden and his friends hear a scary story about the abandoned Obelisx dorms where several students mysteriously vanished. Intrigued they set out to find the abandoned dorm. There they encounter a person who claims to be a shadow duelist, he's wearing the "Millenium Pendant" which looks suspiciously like the Millenium Puzzle. The shadow duelist has captured Alexis, he'll release her if Jaden defeats him in a Shadow duel.

episodes.title: Hanekuribô no kiseki
episodes.plot: The shadow duel continues. Jaden finally realizes the truth behind the shadow duelist, then duel takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.title: Duel and Unusual Punishment
episodes.plot: Crowler knows Jaden and Syrus were in the abandoned dorm. They're informed that they have to duel as a team in a tag team duel. If they don't win the match they'll be expelled. In order to prepare for the duel, Jaden and Syrus duel against each other. During the duel, they'll learn about each other's strength's and weaknesses.

episodes.title: For the Sake of Syrus
episodes.plot: Syrus's dueling issues stems from an incident involving his brother Zane. Jaden tries to build his partner's confidence by challenging Zane to a duel. Zane is the top student at the academy.

episodes.title: Family Business
episodes.plot: Chumly has been at the academy for years, his family believes it's time for him to come home. His father arrives to take him away from the academy. He offers Chumly one last chance to remain at the academy, if Chumly can beat him in a duel.

episodes.title: Tag Team Trial: Part 1
episodes.plot: For being caught being in the off limits area of the old Obelisx dorms, Jaden and Syrus must face off against 2 professional duelists, the Paradox brothers. If they lose, they're out of the academy.

episodes.title: Tag Team Trial: Part 2
episodes.plot: The tag team duel is going on. It's going to take team work to defeat the Paradox brothers. Syrus is still unsure of himself, but he's determined not to disappoint his friend/partner, Jaden.

episodes.title: Formula for Success
episodes.plot: After Chazz's latest defeat by Jaden, Crowler begins to doubt Chazz's dueling ability. He has Bastion duel Chazz. If Chazz can defeat Bastion he's still worthy. If Bastion wins, he'll be offered a place in Obelisx blue.

episodes.title: Monkey See, Monkey Duel
episodes.plot: When Chazz suddenly goes missing, Jaden and the crew go looking for him, but instead of finding Chazz, they find a dueling monkey who takes one of Alexis' friends hostage.

episodes.title: A Spirit Summoned
episodes.plot: After some students accidentally summon a Duel Monster for real, it's up to Jaden to duel him and win their souls back.

episodes.title: Courting Alexis
episodes.plot: Jaden and the captain of the tennis team face off in a duel. The winner of the match becomes Alexis's fiancée.

episodes.title: The Duel Giant
episodes.plot: After a menacing Duel Giant is seen around campus, Dr. Crowler convinces Jaden to track him down, but when Jaden catches up with the Titan, he must beat him in a duel or become his next victim.

episodes.title: Nature of the Draw
episodes.plot: When someone is stealing from the Card Shack, Jaden and the crew go on a steak out to catch the culprit, but when the thief turns out to be a former student who's been living in the jungle, a truly wild duel ensues.

episodes.title: The King of the Copycats: Part 1
episodes.plot: A copycat duelist steals Yugi Muto's deck and mannerisms, and Jaden must duel him to win it back.

episodes.title: The King of the Copycats: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden's duel with the copycat continues. Jaden must find the weakness in Yugi's deck to defeat his opponent

episodes.title: The Maiden in Love
episodes.plot: A new student arrives and moves in with Jaden and Syrus. Soon Jaden catches the new student breaking into Zane's room. He challenges the student to a duel to find out what the student is really after.

episodes.title: The Duel Off: Part 1
episodes.plot: Bastion believes he's finally figured out a way to defeat Jaden. Bastion and Jaden duel in front of the entire school. Bastion has found a way to prevent Jaden from summoning some of his most powerful cards.

episodes.title: The Duel Off: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden is struggling in his duel with Bastion. The winner of this duel will challenge the champion from a rival duel academy.

episodes.title: The Little Belowski
episodes.plot: Crowler hates the idea of Jaden representing the Academy at the school duel. He has a special student duel Jaden. The student has the ability to make people fall asleep.

episodes.title: The New Chazz
episodes.plot: When Chazz ends up shipwrecked at sea, he suddenly finds himself at the doors of North Academy and in a fifty-man duel gauntlet to prove his worth.

episodes.title: School Duel: Part 1
episodes.plot: Chazz and Jaden face off in the school duel. Chazz has a new deck and his brothers have come to put more pressure on him. The duel is televised across the globe.

episodes.title: School Duel: Part 2
episodes.plot: Freedom is on the line as Jaden and Chazz continue to duel it out for school - and personal - pride!

episodes.title: Grave Risk: Part 1
episodes.plot: When Jaden and the gang get trapped in an ancient world, it's up to Jaden to win a duel or be buried alive with the rest of his friends.

episodes.title: Grave Risk: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden continues to battle in the duel of his life to save his friends and the chance to make it back to his world.

episodes.title: Doomsday Duel: Part 1
episodes.plot: When the Shadow Riders descend upon Duel Academy to unleash the three Sacred Beast Cards, Jaden's up first to defend the school.

episodes.title: Doomsday Duel: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden continues his duel against the Shadow Rider known as Nightshroud, who has extra mysteries of his own!

episodes.title: Field of Screams: Part 1
episodes.plot: A vampiress named Camula is the second Shadow Rider to arrive at Duel Academy, but she's not there to suck blood, she's there to suck up souls!

episodes.title: Field of Screams: Part 2
episodes.plot: Camula continues to wreak havoc at Duel Academy, this time setting her sights on Zane.

episodes.title: Field of Screams: Part 3
episodes.plot: Jaden steps up to confront Camula with the souls of Dr. Crowler and Zane at stake.

episodes.title: The Fear Factor
episodes.plot: Jaden and the gang get sucked into a strange vortex where a duelist who bears a striking resemblance to Kaiba forces Jaden to face his worst fears or be overcome by them!

episodes.title: Sibling Rivalry
episodes.plot: Chazz's brothers have come back to Duel Academy for revenge, forcing Chazz to face them in a duel where if he loses, the deed to Duel Academy will be passed to them!

episodes.title: Duel Distractions: Part 1
episodes.plot: The third Shadow Rider arrives and uses all her feminine wiles and charms to distract Bastion.

episodes.title: Duel Distractions: Part 2
episodes.plot: Jaden must duel Tania to snap Bastion out of a lovestruck stupor and keep the Shadow Riders from winning another Spirit Key!

episodes.title: Get Yarr Game On!
episodes.plot: A pirate challenges Jaden to a duel where if he loses, he'll be forced to become the first mate of a new Duel Academy at the bottom of the ocean!

episodes.title: The Dark Scorpions
episodes.plot: In a desperate bid for the remaining Spirit Keys, a unit of the Shadow Riders called the Dark Scorpions steal them... but they end up having to face Chazz in a duel to unlock their magical powers.

episodes.title: A Lying Legend
episodes.plot: The fifth Shadow Rider is unleashed upon Duel Academy, and with an undefeated dueling record and a legendary reputation, he's the most powerful one yet...or is he?

episodes.title: A Reason to Win
episodes.plot: Titan the Shadow Duelist persuades Alexis to duel him to by promising to return her brother's memory is she wins... but if she loses, she'll be the one in need of rescue!

episodes.title: Duel Monsters Spirit Day
episodes.plot: It's Duel Monsters Spirit Day at the Academy, but when someone who looks remarkably like Dark Magician Girl shows up for the annual Costume Duel, Syrus goes gaga.

episodes.title: Hearts Are Wild
episodes.plot: A mysterious Gambler shows up at Duel Academy, and he's bent on dueling Alexis to prove his skills and his... love?

episodes.title: The Seventh Shadow Rider
episodes.plot: When Jaden and the gang go searching for Professor Banner, they find the seventh Shadow Rider instead, and he's even more dangerous than they ever feared.

episodes.title: Amnael's Endgame: Part 1
episodes.plot: Jaden must face Amnael, the seventh Shadow Rider, in a match that will decide not only his fate but the fa te of all his friends!

episodes.title: Amnael's Endgame: Part 2
episodes.plot: Upon learning that the seventh Shadow Rider is really Professor B anner, Jaden must rise to a whole new level of dueling expertise to win the high stakes match.

episodes.title: Chazz-anova
episodes.plot: Chazz a rranges a duel with Alexis so that he can prove his love to her, but Alexis has other ideas.

episodes.title: Rise of the Sacred Beasts: Part 1
episodes.plot: Kagemaru, the leader of the Shadow Riders, descends on Duel Academy and demands a duel with Jaden so that he can raise the Sacred Beasts and win the power to rule the world!

episodes.title: Rise of the Sacred Beasts: Part 2
episodes.plot: Kagemaru and Jaden duel each other with all their might as the fate of the world and Duel Monsters spirits everywhere hang in the balance!

episodes.title: Magna Chum Laude
episodes.plot: Chumly's dream of becoming a card designer might be coming true. A card he designed has been accepted by Pegusus' company. He just needs a recommendation from the school to get the job. To do that he has to face off against the Vice Principal.

episodes.title: Graduation Match: Part 1
episodes.plot: The top graduating student gets to pick his opponent for an end of school year duel. Zane asks Jaden to duel with him. The duel doesn't go as well as Zane hoped, Jaden doesn't seem to be dueling in his usual style.

episodes.title: Graduation Match: Part 2
episodes.plot: Zane and Jaden's duel continues. Jaden is finally dueling as he always has. Zane explains why he chose Jaden as his opponent.
